publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2402.3 Ms Sandra White:Anti-Racism Strategy—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2402) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end “, and expresses concern that Labour and Conservative immigration proposals do not reflect Scotland’s population requirements or multicultural ethos.” Supported by: Christine Grahame* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
